Houston head coach Tom Herman looks on during the first half of an NCAA college football game against Lamar Saturday Sept PERIOD   in Houston PERIOD Eric Christian SmithAP

While UConn at Navy was the only American Conference matchup in Week  nine other teams in the American Athletic Conference were in action against nonconference opponents PERIOD

Overall the American went  on the week PERIOD Each team playing at home secured a win while Cincinnati was the only member of the conference to win on the road PERIOD

Cincinnatis win at Purdue was its first road win over a Big Ten opponent since  when the Bearcats  won at Indiana PERIOD Quarterback Hayden Moore led Cincinnatis offensive attack passing for three touchdowns and running for two more PERIOD The Bearcats defense intercepted Purdue quarterback David Blough five times in a  victory PERIOD

No PERIOD  in the latest AP Poll Houston had to turn to backup quarterback Kyle Postma for their game against Lamar PERIOD The Cougars  took care of business with their only issue being a threehour lightning delay in the  win PERIOD Houston travels to Cincinnati on Thursday to begin each teams conference schedule PERIOD

Tulsa and UCF had tough road matchups against AP top five schools this week at Ohio State and Michigan respectively PERIOD As expected both the Golden Hurricane  and the Knights  were blown out losing by more than  points each PERIOD

East Carolina was victorious against instate rival North Carolina State  PERIOD The Pirates  secured their sixth straight win over ACC opponents behind a balanced attack of  passing yards and  rushing yards PERIOD Anthony Scott led the Pirates finishing with  total yards and two touchdowns including the goahead score with  remaining in the game PERIOD

USF easily beat Northern Illinois behind the 350yard fourtouchdown performance of quarterback Quinton Flowers PERIOD Flowers also added  yards on the ground and the Bulls  outgained the Huskies  in the  win PERIOD

Houston at Cincinnati and Navy at Tulane will be the only American conference games this week PERIOD Notable nonconference games include UConn hosting Virginia USF at Syracuse and Temple at Penn State PERIOD

Josh Buser is a campus correspondent for The Daily Campus PERIOD He can be reached via email at joshua.buseruconn.edu PERIOD
